task.title: Running sIFR
task.shortdesc: sIFR is an effect method of replacing limited-sized areas of text with any different font from any format to which you have access.

step.cmd: Open up the file labeled sIFR.fla, and double click the font item in the library.
Export the movie as a name you will remember.
Set your browser text in CSS so that it is close to the correct width to fill the movie.
Write in which items you have to replace at the bottom of the sIFR.js file.
Include sIFR.js in the head element of your pages.
